title: Customer Service Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Hong Kong Housing Society (Quarry Bay) in Nov 2022
Interview Descriptions: The interviewer will ask about ten questions, and these ten questions may be related to work and work-related. And they will ask some job-related situational questions, and they will want to know how you will deal with it

title: Officer Trainee Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Hong Kong Housing Society
Interview Descriptions:
1st round:
written test
General Test + Aptitude Test + Video Interview 
2nd round: 
Group interview (Cantonese)
Topic: Waste Charging Scheme 
3rd round:
Q&A (individual) (Cantonese)
Question: Ask about experience, creative ways to solve problems
Interview Questions: Did you use any innovative ways to solve the problems in your previous job?

title: Summer Intership Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. The process took 2 months. I interviewed at Hong Kong Housing Society (Ma On Shan Tsuen) in Apr 2022
Interview Descriptions: Self introduction first. Then move on to group decussion with a topic in Chinese, it seem like the topics in DSE Chinese Oral exam, which everyone can talk freely. Another session required interviewee to share their past experiences.
Interview Questions: What have you regret in the past?

title: Officer Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Hong Kong Housing Society in Mar 2022
Interview Descriptions: Self introduction and reason to join Questions related to previous job General knowledge on job related issues General knowledge on the company Strength and weakness How do you see yourself in 5 years
Interview Questions: What do you know about the Housing Society?

title: Officer Trainee (Property) Interview
Application Type: I applied through a recruiter. The process took 2 months. I interviewed at Hong Kong Housing Society in Mar 2022
Interview Descriptions:
Aptitude Test and personality test first
If you are shortlisted, You will be invited to have a group discussion and a written test
Finally, a one-to-one interview 

All interviews were conducted on online platform
Interview Questions:
If you do not have a certificate of property management, why should we hire you?

Why do you think your discipline at university is could help you to get this position?

title: Graduate Trainee Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Hong Kong Housing Society (Hong Kong) in Jan 2022
Interview Descriptions: In general, a candidate must conduct a written test first before proceeding to the next round. The second round selection process is a group interview that lasts for 30 minutes. Once the candidate passed the second round  of group dicussion,  they may require to complete a shl test and a personality test. The last test is just a casual chat between the candidate and the director of hr.
Interview Questions: Why do you want to work in this position?

title: Assistant Officer Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Hong Kong Housing Society (Hong Kong) in Dec 2021
Interview Descriptions: You may start your interview Via Zoom. But you may need to waiting for the interviewer for an hour because they are having meeting. When they are done, you can start the interview. And then you will have a written test.
Interview Questions: Tell me about yourself, one word to describe yourself

title: Summer Intern Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Hong Kong Housing Society
Interview Descriptions: Interview only lasted for around 10-15 minutes and was conducted through video call. Both English and Cantonese was used.  I did a self-intro first and then hr asked me about my personality and previous experiences.
Interview Questions: Describe an experience that you demonstrated good problem solving.

title: Internship Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Hong Kong Housing Society
Interview Descriptions: self intro then ask some quest about the job then ask why u chose this job then ask some quest again then request u to answer the quest slowly in 30 words

title: Intern Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. I interviewed at Hong Kong Housing Society (Hong Kong) in Dec 2020
Interview Descriptions: Interview with HR and 2 managers. Mainly talk about technical skills and news related to your major. Which team u would like to join? How can you contribute to HS? Why would u choose HS?
Interview Questions: Question base on you CV Why u choose HS

title: Customer Service Representative Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Hong Kong Housing Society
Interview Descriptions:
1. written test (Skill Test: Microsoft Office, typing test)
2. meeting with your supervisor (1 on 1, or 2 on 1)
3. body check (after all you should pass it before going to work)
Interview Questions: Why do you wanna work here?

title: Trainee Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Hong Kong Housing Society
Interview Descriptions: There were four questions in the required written test, and then a face to face interview was conducted, which took me less than an hour. It was quite casual and relax.

title: Business Development Officer Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Hong Kong Housing Society (Hong Kong) in Jan 2019
Interview Descriptions: Written test,Computer test and Individual interviews. Around half day and 2 round interviews in order to complete above test. For the first round interview, including computer test and written test. For the second interview which is face to face 1 on 1 Q & A interview.
Interview Questions:
Create proposal 
Draft email
Excel 
Word 
Power point

title: Officer (Elderly Services) Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Hong Kong Housing Society
Interview Descriptions:
Computer test, written test, in-person interview. All tests and questions were quite easy. 
Finished in one day. Received offer in 2 weeks.
The interviewer(s) kept negotiating your expected salary (lower salary)
Interview Questions: Bottom line of your expected salary
